articles.content:
Hundreds of people lined the streets in Gateshead for the joint-funeral of a nurse and his parents who all died of coronavirus. 
Keith Dunnington, 54, from South Shields, was a 'popular and hard-working' staff nurse at Queen Elizabeth Hospital who died on 19… [+2380 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Coronavirus: Track and trace a 'mammoth task' in Wales - BBC News
articles.description: Councils will need "significant additional resources", the local government association says.
articles.content:
Tracking and tracing coronavirus cases in Wales is a "mammoth" task, the leader of the Welsh Local Government Association has said. 
Andrew Morgan said councils would need "significant additional resources" for the "vital" work.
The Welsh Government wants i… [+2659 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: How has the lockdown harmed our mental health? - Sky News
articles.description: Campaigners are warning of a surge in mental health cases as the lockdown takes its toll on Britain. If you are affected by the story and want to talk to som...
articles.content:
Campaigners are warning of a surge in mental health cases as the lockdown takes its toll on Britain.
If you are affected by the story and want to talk to someone, you can call in the UK the Samaritans free on 116 123 or at jo@samaritans.org.
